channel.title: 50% of RS2 Slaughtered; Will you still play?
channel.description:
Alright, so now Jagex has really done it. They have done what 80% of the RuneScape community was praying for not to happen.
Here's a list of what they have done and what a lot of people think was a big mistake:
[ul][li]Added Assist System [/li][li]Nearly Removed All of Staking; Replaced With 3k Staking Cap [list][li]Giving F2p what they want (Duel arena), while taking away what P2p loves (wildy, tele-block, etc.) [/li][li]Added Grand Exchange (I love it, but a lot of other people don't) [list][li]Removed 99.9% of the Wilderness, now leaving it as more of a "Dark Forest full of Ghosts that Randomly Attack You" aka: a Place for Noobs to Hang Out [/li][li]Removed item dropping (killing both team looting in boss fights and mainly the beloved PKing) [list][li]GOING to remove imbalanced trades (Say goodbye to loans from friends! Plus potion sharing, etc.) [/list]
That's only some of it.
Now here's some things that will be replacing the classical features:
[list] [li]LootShare (well, now that you can't split D-chain drops anymore, you've just gotta pray that LootShare will get one for you) [/li][li]The Grand Exchange (merchanting is going to be nearly completely dead after the new trade system is relesed) [list][li]Bounty-Hunter (in replacement of PKing. Seems like a good idea, but think hard: Pures and lower level PKers wont stand much of a chance; IMO) [/li][li]Gravestones (Hurry, Run, Run!! Quickly, before your items don't appear for noobs to grab, but are DESTROYED!!) [list][li]Some Ghost Crap (Yay for, uhh, Drag dagger drops that are only worth 20k!! Or maybe a clue scroll... That's if you DON'T get raped by them) [/li][li]SUMMONING!! (YAY for Summoning!! -- It's all just to distract you from how good the game used to be...) [/list]
Well, that's all I've got for now.
So, what do you think of the game now? Will you still play it to kill time, be a hardcore fan, or just to become a bounty-hunter and own some noobs (and about that: prepare to see lots of pures named "Dog the bounty hunter" or some crap like that, lol), or just give up and move onto a real game like Counter-Strike.
I'm still going to play because a game is a game and I love all games. It'll just take some time to adjust to this new enviorment, but I say it'll be worth it (to either see the rise of the game, or it's downfall).
Cheers, ~Dizzy :cool:[/list][/list][/list][/list][/ul]

exe626:

I don’t know, I like the randoms. Since I’ve gotten a new account, I’d like to have all my old random set items back.

They get annoying once you already have the sets. >.<
